attributes.action: Review the mini budget. It's unsustainable and destabilising UK economy.
attributes.additional_details:
The mini budget destabilised our financial markets. £ lowest in decades, making oil even dearer to buy. The IMF is concerned and some major lenders have withdrawn mortgage products today.

Getting rid of 45% income tax only helps the rich. If you're earning £150k pa you can afford food and bills. 

The financial markets don't like the increase in UK borrowing. 

We are coming out of a time covid lockdown spending. 

Have you seen the waits in NHS.
 
Think about how much you're borrowing.
attributes.background:
We are going through unprecedented times re fuel costs. Inflation is high (due to fuel costs and increased production costs) & the Bank of England are trying to reduce it through interest rates. 
I couldn't believe the mini budget, totally undermining what BoE is doing & destabilising £ stock mkt.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Scrap the mini-budget and ensure independent review of any replacement package
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623684
